title: How do you detox from the COVID vaccine?
description: Answer (1 of 29): If you believe that you need to detox from the Covid-19 vaccines it suggests that you know they are toxic. If so you are correct. But this raises the question - if you know about this toxicity why take the vaccine? Then you would not need to detox. Perhaps you took the vaccine...
